message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset that will bring significant value to your business. My initial offer is $18000 for the product. I'm confident that this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000 for the product. I believe it's a bit steep at $18000, and I'd like to see some room for negotiation.

I understand your concerns about the price, Bob, but I have to prioritize getting a fair value for the product. Considering its worth to you is $10000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. My revised offer is $16000 for the product. I'm confident that this is a reasonable compromise, and I'm open to further discussion if you're willing to meet me at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $16000. I'm willing to go up to $14000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me is $10000

I understand you're willing to go up to $14000, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. Considering the value it holds for you, I'm willing to make another concession. My revised offer is $16500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, and I'm confident you'll find it a reasonable compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $13500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me is $10000

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. My revised offer is $17000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable price, considering the value it holds for you and the concessions I've made so far.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $17000 and my previous offer of $13500. My revised offer is $15250 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me is $10000

I'm not willing to meet you halfway, Bob, as it would leave me with a significant loss. However, I'm still open to finding a mutually beneficial agreement. My revised offer is $17500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value it holds for you and the concessions I've made so far.

I'm not willing to go any higher than $15000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me is $10000. If we can't meet at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to explore other options, including buying the product from John for $10000
